function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Zoonotic viruses causing disease outbreaks through interspecific transmission from wild animals to humans","Impact":"Increased risk of disease emergence and transmission in urban settlements, leading to public health crises","Mitigation":"Implementing strict regulations on habitat encroachment, habitat fragmentation, and biodiversity loss to limit interspecific transmission","Technologies":"Satellite monitoring, GIS mapping, and advanced wildlife tracking technologies","People":"Urban residents, public health organizations, wildlife conservation groups","Owner":"Government authorities, environmental agencies, wildlife management organizations"},{"Description":"Viral shedding and mutation due to human disturbances to habitats and animal hosts","Impact":"Formation of new viral variants capable of infecting humans, leading to increased disease transmission","Mitigation":"Reducing anthropogenic environmental disturbances and stress on animal hosts through conservation efforts and habitat protection","Technologies":"Remote sensing technologies, environmental monitoring systems, wildlife conservation technologies","People":"Wildlife conservationists, environmental organizations, public health agencies","Owner":"Environmental agencies, conservation groups, public health authorities"}]}
